docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: THE backyard of the Lopez home on Brevoort Road here used to be quite pleasant. It had a vegetable garden, a badminton court and lawn chairs, and it was large enough that Rudy Lopez bought a lawn tractor to mow the grass.

headline.main: Their Yard Now a Pond, Couple In Chappaqua Assail Planners

docs.snippet: LEAD: THE backyard of the Lopez home on Brevoort Road here used to be quite pleasant. It had a vegetable garden, a badminton court and lawn chairs, and it was large enough that Rudy Lopez bought a lawn tractor to mow the grass.
